title: Does using nocturne's ult count as a gank?
body: Cause people tell me "you aren't ganking" I mean I don't rely on it but they seem to have made a Meme out of it.

replies.body: the term ganking doesnt imply the means to  do it. it just describe the action of doing rather than the means.
I love darkness whenever an ally is about to die just to make the enemy scared. the funny thing is how often it works and saves them.
The Tfw when your darkness allows a team mate to hop a wall and cause an enemy to completey lose grack of them.  Good stuff.
Only if you get an assist or a kill
That depends on if you are using it to gank or not.
